#summary The img element represents an image or graphic.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *img element*

== Usage ==

{{{
<img src="infinite-cats.jpg"
     width="640"
     height="480"
     alt="[A picture of a cat looking at pictures of cats]">
}}}

...

== Attributes ==

Common attributes:

  * [ImgAltAttribute alt]
  * [ImgBorderAttribute border]
  * [ImgHeightAttribute height]
